name: GlassBridge Enterprises
short_description: GlassBridge Enterprises, Inc., through its subsidiary, GlassBridge Asset Management, LLC operates as an investment advisor focusing on technology-driven quantitative strategies and other alternative investment strategies.
long_description: GlassBridge Enterprises, Inc., through its subsidiary, GlassBridge Asset Management, LLC operates as an investment advisor focusing on technology-driven quantitative strategies and other alternative investment strategies. The company was formerly known as Imation Corp. and changed its name to GlassBridge Enterprises, Inc. in February 2017. GlassBridge Enterprises, Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
